means: 变化( vary的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: The reasons for letting a house, or part of one, are varied.
sentence.Network_cn: 把整套房子或其中一部分租出去，其原因是多种多样的。

sentence.Network_en: A rich and varied cultural life is essential for this couple.
sentence.Network_cn: 丰富多样的文化生活对这对夫妇而言至关重要。

sentence.Network_en: It is essential that your diet is varied and balanced.
sentence.Network_cn: 关键是你的饮食要多样化，并保持均衡。

entry.tran: 多种多样的;形形色色的
entry.def: Something that is varied consists of things of different types, sizes, or qualities.

example.ex: It is essential that your diet is varied and balanced...
example.tran: 关键是你的饮食要多样化，并保持均衡。

example.ex: Before his election to the presidency, Mitterrand had enjoyed a long and varied career.
example.tran: 在当选总统之前，密特朗有过一段漫长的职业生涯，干过很多不同的工作。

sentences.sentence: "varied motives prompt people to join a political party"

means.word_mean: 3. broken away from sameness or identity or duplication;

auth_sentence.content: The pace of the school day is highly varied.
auth_sentence.res_content: The pace of the school day is highly varied.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The pace of the school day is highly varied.

auth_sentence.content: But at least we are varied in our addictions.
auth_sentence.res_content: But at least we are varied in our addictions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But at least we are varied in our addictions.

auth_sentence.content: My stories have varied wildly in type and scope.
auth_sentence.res_content: My stories have varied wildly in type and scope.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My stories have varied wildly in type and scope.

Sentence.sentence: Well, that sounds much more varied and interesting.

means.word_mean: 各种各样的;各不相同的;形形色色的；多变的, 变化的, 不同的

sentences.en: He had had a varied training and held many offices.
sentences.cn: 他受过多方面的训练, 担任过许多职务。
他过着丰富多彩的生活。
